subject: Tennis
BNP Paribas Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Top-ranked Novak Djokovic defeated Nicolas Almagro, 6-3, 6-4, winning the final three games of the match to reach the semifinals of the BNP Paribas Open in Indian Wells, Calif.
snippet: Top-ranked Novak Djokovic defeated Nicolas Almagro, 6-3, 6-4, winning the final three games of the match to reach the semifinals of the BNP Paribas Open in Indian Wells, Calif.
